entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
